The video below discusses the basic use of `R` through `RStudio`. We discuss how to create an `R` object, how to learn more about `R` objects, and the basics of object oriented programming in `R`.

I highly recommend watching the video using the 'full' Panopto player. There is a 'pop out' button in the bottom right of the video to enter this viewer.
